mtibattery package¶

Submodules¶

mtibattery.mtibattery module¶

This module allows the user to conveniently access the output of a MtiCorp Battery Analizer through a python interface and to run several computations and to plot/output the data.

class mtibattery.mtibattery.CellReadings(filename)¶

Bases: object

Easy access to data from mticorp battery analyzer output.

get_duration()¶

Returns total duration of the battery analysis.

Returns:

dt.timedelta

timedelta object containing total duration.
plot_efficiency(start=0, stop=None, step=1, mode='standard')¶

Plot battery efficiency as a function of the cycle number.

Parameters:

start : int

First cycle to plot

stop : int

Last cycle to plot

step : int

Read every ‘step’s cycles.

mode : str {‘standard’, ‘inverse’}

Choose whether to compute discharge/charge (standard) or inverse.

Notes

The efficiency of a cycle is computed as the ratio between the discharge and charge time. If mode is set to ‘inverse’, then it is computes as the ratio between the charge and discharge time.

plot_spcapacity(start=0, stop=None, step=1)¶

Plot specific capacity as a function of the voltage.

Parameters:

start : int

First cycle to plot

stop : int

Last cycle to plot

step : int

Read every ‘step’s cycles.
plot_voltage(start=0, stop=None, step=1)¶

Plot voltage as a function of the record index.

Parameters:

start : int

First cycle to plot

stop : int

Last cycle to plot

step : int

Read every ‘step’s cycles.
plot_voltage_delta(step_label)¶

Plot difference between initial and final voltage of step type.

The method plot_voltage_delta plots the difference between the initial and the final voltage of a given step type as a function of the cycle number.

Parameters:

step_label : str {‘Rest’, ‘CC_Charge’, ‘CC_DChg’}

Contains step type.
class mtibattery.mtibattery.Cycle(cycle_header)¶

Bases: object

Contains information of a (rest)-charge-discharge cycle.

get_duration()¶

Returns total duration of a battery (rest)-charge-discharge cycle.

Returns:

dt.timedelta

timedelta object containing total duration of the battery cycle.
plot_voltage(step='all')¶

Plot voltage of a cycle as a function of the record index.

Parameters:

step : str {‘all’, ‘charge’, ‘discharge’}

Defines which step of a cycle should be plotted.
class mtibattery.mtibattery.Step(step_header, parent_cycle_id)¶

Bases: object

Contains informations about either a rest, charge or discharge step.
